Laura Marie Davis

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Marie Davis
  2. Foster Name: Margaret
  3. Alternate Foster Name: [Peggy]
  4. Foster Family: Rollie J. and Pearl Stephenson
  5. Location of Family: Gresham, NE
  6. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  7. Arrival Place: Osceola, NE
  8. Age on Arrival: 2
  9. Date of Birth: Unknown
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Margaret Kidder
  12. Spouse Name: William Kidder
  13. Source: The Osceola Record, 24 September 1925; The Osceola Record, 24 September 1925 [different column]
